name: Perses - Destructible Stealth Action Game
description:
Perses is a stealth action game set in a near future.

You play as an MI6 Agent who is tasked with tasking out the Flounder terrorist leader who has took over a weapon development facility.

Choose from a variety of weapons, paths and destruction to achieve your goal. In Perses EVERYTHING inside a room can be destroyed. Cover is not your ally.

Stealth your way to your objectives avoiding terrorists to complete your objective

Feedback can be sent to z-ac@hotmail.co.uk  or discord as "Speaker Of The House#3472"
